sentences.english: Some new discov- eries and their significances about olfactory system.
sentences.chinese: 關於嗅覺系統的若干新發現及其意義。

sentences.english: Guided by their sense of smell, they will return in a few years to  spawn.
sentences.chinese: 在其嗅覺的指引下，幾年後它們會回到這裏產卵。

sentences.english: Repellency is not confined to the olfactory senses.
sentences.chinese: 防護性不只限於嗅覺感官。

sentences.english: The dog will smell out a thief.
sentences.chinese: 狗會靠其嗅覺而找到賊。

sentences.english: In the years since, Dr. DeVere has recovered much of his ability to smell and taste.
sentences.chinese: 從那年以後，他的大部分嗅覺和味覺得到了康復。

sentences.english: Having or characterized by a well-developed sense of smell.
sentences.chinese: 使用嗅覺認出或者察覺。

sentences.english: Based on these findings, Keller suspects that each person has an olfactory blind spot.
sentences.chinese: 根據這些發現，凱勒推斷，每個人都有一個嗅覺盲區。

sentences.english: Had he lost his power of scenting out catastrophes?
sentences.chinese: 對災難他已失去嗅覺了嗎？

sentences.english: Programmers with a shred of architectural sensibility shun these quagmires.
sentences.chinese: 擁有結構性嗅覺的程序員避開了這片沼澤。

sentences.english: Their brains are very silly, and their vision is poor, but they have strong sense of smell and hearing.
sentences.chinese: 犀牛頭腦比較遲鈍，視覺很差，但嗅覺和聽覺敏銳。

sentences.english: Taste and smell are closely connected.
sentences.chinese: 味覺和嗅覺是密切相關的。

sentences.english: The trained dog can well smell.
sentences.chinese: 經過訓練的狗有更敏銳的嗅覺。

sentences.english: After controlling for nasal polyposis, histological variables were not associated with postoperative improvement in olfaction.
sentences.chinese: 在控制鼻息肉，術後嗅覺改善組織的變量是不相關的。

sentences.english: Or could it be what Smell-O-Vision was to cinema?
sentences.chinese: 或者說它還是會像影院的嗅覺電影那樣失敗呢？

sentences.english: Antes can smell things as well as dogs can;
sentences.chinese: 螞蟻的嗅覺和狗一樣靈敏。

sentences.english: Dogs like Saint Bernards have a good sense of smell.
sentences.chinese: 聖伯納德種狗有優良的嗅覺。

definition: body odor/to appreciate a subtle taste
